name: Space and Dice
description:
This is a game where I'm trying to mash two really nice games together:

  • Slide and Dice
  • Faster Than Light

It's still pretty early in the development, but you can play it till the end boss.

A tutorial is coming, but for now I recommend playing Slice and Dice, they have a good tutorial and many of my systems are very similar to that game.

I plan on diverging from Slice and Dice as "I follow the fun". Also better graphics will come with time. There will also be a story where you are not just fighting these enemies but trying to figure out what happened in this crystal realm.

Feel free to try it out and tell me what else you would love to see in this game!
